attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister's attention is brought to the feelings of the population and in particular the residents of Jacqui Smith's constituency who are extremely angry over her on-going part in the expenses scandal, and would view her peerage as a reward for misbehaviour in public service, and would further undermine the public's trust in Parliament.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
